H0.text: when did red dead redemption 1 come out. June 2009

H1.text: when did red dead redemption 1 come out. October 2008

H2.text: when did red dead redemption 1 come out. April 2011

H3.text: when did red dead redemption 1 come out. May 2010

A4.text: Red Dead Redemption was released for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 in May 2010, for the Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4 in August 2023, for Windows in October 2024, and for Android, iOS, Nintendo Switch 2, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X/S in December 2025.

A5.text: The game missed its original projected late 2009 and April 2010 release dates, pushed back to May 18, 2010, in North America, and May 21 internationally, citing the 'optimal time frame' for release.
